# Getting started with Momento Cache

If you're looking to jump in and get started with Momento Cache, you've come to the right place.

## Pre-requisites

Follow our [step-by-step instructions](./develop/authentication/api-keys) to create an API key via the [Momento console](https://console.gomomento.com). Come back here when you have your key.

## Using the [Momento console](https://console.gomomento.com)

<div>
    <video width="100%" height="100%" playsInline autoPlay muted loop>
        <source src="/console-demo.mp4" type="video/mp4" />
    </video>
</div>

## Using the Momento CLI

You can also install the Momento CLI locally (Linux, Windows, Mac) if desired. The latest version of the CLI and instructions for installation and usage is available in [this repo](https://github.com/momentohq/momento-cli).

<div>
    <video width="100%" height="100%" playsInline autoPlay muted loop>
        <source src="/Momento_getting_started.mp4" type="video/mp4" />
    </video>
</div>

## Using the Momento SDKs

Ready to start writing some code? Check out our [SDKs](/platform/sdks) page for a list of all of our supported languages. Each
SDK has a quick start for using Momento Cache or Topics. Here are direct links to a few of the most popular ones:

- [Node.js](/platform/sdks/nodejs) ([cache](/platform/sdks/nodejs/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/nodejs/topics))
- [JavaScript Web SDK](/platform/sdks/web) ([cache](/platform/sdks/nodejs/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/nodejs/topics))
- [Python](/platform/sdks/python) ([cache](/platform/sdks/python/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/python/topics))
- [Java](/platform/sdks/java) ([cache](/platform/sdks/java/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/java/topics))
- [Go](/platform/sdks/go) ([cache](/platform/sdks/go/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/go/topics))
- [.NET](/platform/sdks/dotnet) ([cache](/platform/sdks/dotnet/cache), [topics](/platform/sdks/dotnet/topics))
